trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting and editing a connection string property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> object at design time.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> class is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> object that can be used at design time to select and edit a connection string expression and to assign the expression to a control property.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> class at design time to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property.
If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface is available, connection strings are retrieved from the data services of the visual designer.
If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface is not available, a modal dialog box is shown to allow editing of the connection string.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> with a property.
When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method displays a user interface for building the connection string expression and returns the connection string that is selected by the user.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method indicates the display style of the user interface.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor"></xref> class.
Returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> that the connection string applies to.
The property of the , if the instance is not `null`; otherwise, an empty string ("").
Sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> that the connection string applies to.
